title: Attrition continues to be an ongoing phenomenon, says CEO of L&T Tech - CNBCTV18
content: Attrition continues to be an ongoing phenomenon, says CEO of L&T Tech  CNBCTV18
description: Amit Chadha, Chief Executive Officer andÂ  Managing Director, L&T Technology Services, told CNBC-TV18 that while demand is robust for the company, attrition continues to be an ongoing phenomenon.
